abstract: Citigroup’s chief executive, Vikram Pandit, emphasized on Friday’s conference call that despite having a core and a noncore side, Citi remains “one company.”

lead_paragraph: You’ve heard of the “one China” policy — now, Vikram Pandit brings you the One Citi policy.

headline.main: A Tale of Two Citis? Not Quite.
